item.description:
"Do you work in a hard-driving workplace, and seem to check your soul at the door?" Does oppressive pressure cloud your cubicle? Is everyone way to serious? Are you slowly boiling?"These are excerpt questions from Guest Speaker & Author Sharon Hoyle Weber from "Hot in the Pot"- A survival guide for the REAL YOU in the corporate world will be with us this evening.

She will chat a bit about the 12 Secrets that the "Thrivers" have learned along the way...in the hopes that the corporate mundane life doesn't suck the life out of you!

Join us for a bit of inspiration, connection, humor and fun.

As usual we shall have a 15 min presentation by our guest speaker, then we will have our breakout sessions to chat about how this may or may not apply to us in our lives.

Bring a friend....Seating is limited so rsvp today!

Hope to see you there!

Dani
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess where Cocktails & Conversations
item.name: Be YOU in the Corporate World??? Yes it IS possible *Special Guest Speaker*
